comment._content: From her hairstyle and hat this could have been taken during the flapper era - 1920's

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: American actress Pauline Chase (1885-1962): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pauline_Chase From 1906-1913, she played Peter Pan on the stage, selected by JM Barrie himself for the role.
